titles.title: Angels We Have Heard on High (French carol)

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Shepherds, why this jubilee? Why your joyous strains prolong? What may the gladsome tidings be Which inspire your heavenly song? Glo——–ria in excelsis Deo Glo——–ria in excelsis Deo.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
